body:
`spack install pkgconfig` fails with

```
==> Installing pkgconf
==> Searching for binary cache of pkgconf
==> Warning: No Spack mirrors are currently configured
==> No binary for pkgconf found: installing from source
==> Error: [Errno 13] Permission denied: '/-'
```

I have a feeling it's related to https://github.com/spack/spack/pull/9772 


@becker33 @tgamblin @scheibelp ping.
title: spack install fails on macOS
